default: Military aid to Ukraine needs to be stronger and faster.
Let's increase restrictions against Russia ASAP.
We need to increase support to Ukraine, otherwise Russia will want more.
Ukrainian soldiers need more weapons and military equipment. Please do all you can to support them.
Our people cannot accept such Russian aggression against Ukrainian civilians. Let's support Ukraine with more military equipment ASAP.
es: Queremos un apoyo militar más fuerte y más rápido para Ucrania. España cuenta contigo
fr: Je vous demande de rendre le soutien militaire à l'Ukraine plus fort et plus rapide. La France compte sur vous
it: Le chiedo di rendere il supporto militare all'Ucraina più forte e più veloce. L'Italia conta su di te
pt: Peço-lhe que torne a ajuda militar à Ucrânia mais forte e mais rápida. Portugal está a contar consigo.
uk: I ask you to make military aid to Ukraine stronger and faster. The UK is counting on you
